channel.title: #THRpodcasts on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in #THRpodcasts on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Awards Chatter’ Pod: ‘White Lotus’ Star Parker Posey on What It’s Like to Finally Find Herself at the Center of the Cultural Conversation
item.description: The best supporting actress in a drama series Emmy nominee also discusses the pros and cons of being the “queen of the indies,” her Christopher Guest collabs and reuniting with Sam Rockwell in Martin
